TABLE.NAME: treasurehunt
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_treasurehunt in a course.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course treasure hunt activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the treasurehunt activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: playwithoutmoving
FIELD.COMMENT: If true students may play from their computers without moving to places. If false they need to be on location.

FIELD.NAME: tracking
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the system saves a log with the location of every user during the game.

FIELD.NAME: showboard
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the hunt's board of progress is shown to users regardless the permission.

FIELD.NAME: custommapconfig
FIELD.COMMENT: If a custom map background is uploaded this is the BBOX of the position over the earth.

FIELD.NAME: groupmode
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the activity will be in groups.

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowdescription
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the treasurehunt intro will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: allowattemptsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, submissions will only be accepted after this date.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final date after which submissions will no longer be accepted for this treasurehunt without an extensions.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade for this treasure hunt. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale.

FIELD.NAME: gradepenlocation
FIELD.COMMENT: The penalty for failure a localization expressed in % of the grade.

FIELD.NAME: gradepenanswer
FIELD.COMMENT: The penalty for failure an answer expressed in % of the grade.

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the values TREASUREHUNT_GRADEFROMSTAGES, TREASUREHUNT_GRADEFROMTIME, TREASUREHUNT_GRADEFROMPOSITION.

FIELD.NAME: completionfinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the activity emits a COMPLETION_COMPLETE state.

FIELD.NAME: completionpass
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the activity emits a COMPLETION_COMPLETE state.

FIELD.NAME: playerstyle
FIELD.COMMENT: User interface for the Player page.

TABLE.NAME: treasurehunt_roads
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about a road of mod_treasurehunt in a course.

FIELD.NAME: treasurehuntid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identying the activity created

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name field for each road

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the group can play this road

FIELD.NAME: groupingid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the grouping can play this road

FIELD.NAME: validated
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the road has been validated to play

TABLE.NAME: treasurehunt_stages
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about each stage of every road in a course.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name field for each stage

FIELD.NAME: roadid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifying the road created

FIELD.NAME: position
FIELD.COMMENT: Order of the stages in every road. Every road starts with stage position = 1

FIELD.NAME: cluetext
FIELD.COMMENT: Clue to reach the next stage

FIELD.NAME: playstagewithoutmoving
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, students can play from their computers without moving to places only during the performance of the stage associated. Then it will continue using the game settings

FIELD.NAME: activitytoend
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity to be completed before the clue show

FIELD.NAME: questiontext
FIELD.COMMENT: General text of the question to be answered before the clue show

FIELD.NAME: qrtext
FIELD.COMMENT: Text to be readed by a QR scanner.

FIELD.NAME: geom
FIELD.COMMENT: Keep stage geometry

TABLE.NAME: treasurehunt_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information on each attempt by a user to solve a stage.

FIELD.NAME: stageid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the stage that the user is trying to solve

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id who made the attempt

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group id who made the attempt

FIELD.NAME: success
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the stage has been overcome

FIELD.NAME: penalty
FIELD.COMMENT: If it is true flag as failed a question or location

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the type of attempt. There are 3 types: location, question and activity

FIELD.NAME: questionsolved
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the stage's question has been solved

FIELD.NAME: activitysolved
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the stage's activitytoend has been solved

FIELD.NAME: geometrysolved
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the stage's geometry has been solved

FIELD.NAME: location
FIELD.COMMENT: Keep the attempt location of users / groups

FIELD.NAME: treasurehuntid
FIELD.COMMENT: Locked page

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifiying user

TABLE.NAME: treasurehunt_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about each answer of every stage's question.

FIELD.NAME: stageid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifiying stage's question

FIELD.NAME: answertext
FIELD.COMMENT: General text of the answer

FIELD.NAME: correct
FIELD.COMMENT: If true the answer is correct

TABLE.NAME: treasurehunt_track
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores position tracks of the participants.

FIELD.NAME: treasurehuntid
FIELD.COMMENT: Treasurehunt game that generated the trace.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User id

FIELD.NAME: stageid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identifies the last stage that the user has solved

FIELD.NAME: location
FIELD.COMMENT: The location of user
